message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"heavy; important","sentence":"东西很重。","image_prompt":"A large bag sits heavily on the ground. The style is soft apocalypse animation—muted, faded colors, hazy background, and a dreamy, atmospheric feel. The bag appears noticeably heavy, perhaps bulging and deforming under its own weight. Surroundings are subtle, with cracked pavement and faint, abandoned cityscape. The focus is on visualizing 'heavy' through the object, in an imaginative, softly post-apocalyptic animated scene.","sentence_translation":"The thing is heavy."}
